page.title: 07Transport
page.content: People generally travel by car as Public Transport is very limited.There is{a Southern Vectis Bus Service No46} during the Summer months.This hourly service operates from Sandown to Alum Bay/Yarmouth and return along the Military Road,a stretch of which is in our area.Most residents live at least one mile from the nearest bus stop on the Military Road.There would be a possible two mile journey on foot or by car to catch the Newport bus at Chale or Chale Green.{A Post Bus}also runs in this area.It is in operation six days a week(not Sunday)all year round apart from Public Holidays.It makes one journey and return to Newport each day.Instead of the usual bus tickets passengers are issued with postage stamps stuck on a card which is then franked by the driver.School children travel by car,taxi and bus.
